answers.answer: What dd did the doc give you by your last lmp?  I would go by that instead of the ultrasound!!
she actually had her period til january and when she had her u/s feb 27th the lady who read it said 5/1 as a due date

the doctor didn't give you a dd based on the lmp? just waited for the ultrasound?  As long as everything has been going well, I wouldn't expect to go real early if this is your first child.  Don't get me wrong, it can happen, but usually if you have had more than one child, are having multiples, or other complications such as gestational diabetes or placenta previa

question: So we had an appoint this last thursday and the dr said everything looked fine. Some of you know that her dd is 5/1 by having 1 u/s done in the  third 3rd trimester that was taken at the end of feb. Heres what doesn't make sense about it, the dr said that the baby hasn't gotten a whole lot bigger and that the u/s can be off by 3 weeks (which i already knew) she also said that she doesn't believe the baby will come before 5/1 and if it does then it won't be good. The dr. is also going to wait untl the child comes out on its own. I'm pretty convinced that the dr has her doubts about the u/s being right and that is way she rescheduled her for the 15th and then 2weeks after that which would be around 5/1. Should we be concerned about all this or not. Thanks.**Also thanks to all those who have read and answered my previous questions***
title: Update: about our Dr. vist
